article.headline: Charting market cross currents:  S&P 500 narrowly holds 200-day average
article.body: U.S. stocks are firmly higher early Friday, rising in the wake of Thursday’s aggressive broadly-based market downdraft. Against this backdrop, the S&P 500 has thus far maintained key support, an area matching the 200-day moving average, currently 3,014, and the 3,000 mark. Before detailing the U.S. markets’ wider view, the S&P 500’s hourly...
